ModMetaData.name: Master of Crafting
ModMetaData.author: leafzxg
ModMetaData.description:
Supported Languages: English Russian (русский) Korean (한국) Polish ChineseSimplified (简体中文) ChineseTraditional (繁體中文)
[Mod version: 1.3.0] Function: Allowed to make 5/10/20 Drugs in bulk Allowed to make 5 Components(Component,AdvancedComponent) in bulk Allowed to make 5 Chemfuel in bulk Allowed to make 10 Shells(HighExplosive,Incendiary,EMP,Firefoam) in bulk Allowed to make 10 patchleather in bulk Allowed to make any stone blocks in bulk Allowed to smelt metal from slag in bulk
Features: Bulk production requires extra material. The more copies you make, the more mates you need per copy.(For example,make 20 drugs in bulk requires 5% more extra material than the original.) The more copies you make, the less time you spend on per copy.
Shells,Components,Chemfuel,stone blocks,smelt metal NOT applicable to the above rules,per copy' time and material is sames as the original.
